com.facebook.rendercore

Interface MountItemsPool.ItemPool

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MountContentPool
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMountContentPool, DisabledMountContentPool, HostMountContentPool
    Enclosing class:
    MountItemsPool

    public static interface MountItemsPool.ItemPool
    Content item pools that RenderCore uses to recycle content (such as Views)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object acquire(Context c, ContentAllocator poolableMountContent)
      Acquire a pooled content item from the pool
      void maybePreallocateContent(Context c, ContentAllocator poolableMountContent)
      Called early in the lifecycle to allow the pool implementation to preallocate items in the pool (as released items)
      void release(java.lang.Object item)
      Called when an item is released and can return to the pool

    • Method Detail

      • acquire

        java.lang.Object acquire(Context c,
                         ContentAllocator poolableMountContent)
        Acquire a pooled content item from the pool
        Parameters:
        c - the Android context
        renderUnit - the RenderUnit for the item
        Returns:
        a pooled content item

      • release

        void release(java.lang.Object item)
        Called when an item is released and can return to the pool
        Parameters:
        item - the item to release to the pool

      • maybePreallocateContent

        void maybePreallocateContent(Context c,
                             ContentAllocator poolableMountContent)
        Called early in the lifecycle to allow the pool implementation to preallocate items in the pool (as released items)
        Parameters:
        c - the android context
        renderUnit - the RenderUnit for the item
